cdf3e56bacd3895262af8a1df9ca5c81f4071970.commitMessage: Utils class has been splitted to CommonUtils and TokenUtils. Issue #1898

c0446a825514ea0279b8c22f633f2c4e3c73dc1f.commitMessage:
Fix PMD violations from UseVarargs rule, issue #999

The changes are fully backward-compatible. Method with vararg can be invoked both using array and list of parameters.

e50e1fcd1c17ba1f73d11df38382907cc163a1d1.commitMessage:
Use the new syntactic sugar "for loop".

End of the cosmetic changes.

a501b8d95ac2840ce201549e552f2cc540fde4ce.commitMessage: fix for bug 1560940: MultipleStringLiteralCheck now ignores annotations by default. It is possible to retain the old behaviour by setting the new check property ignoreOccurrenceContext to an empty value.
